sentences.en: I am interested in science.
sentences.zh: 我对科学感兴趣。

sentences.en: Science helps us understand the world.
sentences.zh: 科学帮助我们了解世界。

sentences.en: We visited the museum last Sunday.
sentences.zh: 我们上周日参观了博物馆。

sentences.en: You can learn about history in the museum.
sentences.zh: 你可以在博物馆里了解历史。

sentences.en: I need to go to the post office to send a letter.
sentences.zh: 我需要去邮局寄一封信。

sentences.en: The post office is closed on Sundays.
sentences.zh: 邮局周日不营业。

sentences.en: I bought a new novel at the bookstore yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天在书店买了一本新小说。

sentences.en: The bookstore near our school has a lot of storybooks for children.
sentences.zh: 我们学校附近的书店有很多儿童故事书。

sentences.en: We often go to the cinema on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在周末去电影院。

sentences.en: The new film will be shown in the cinema next week.
sentences.zh: 这部新电影下周将在电影院上映。

sentences.en: I went to the hospital to see a doctor.
sentences.zh: 我去医院看医生。

sentences.en: The hospital is on the next street.
sentences.zh: 医院在下一条街上。

sentences.en: We need to look left and right before crossing the road.
sentences.zh: 过马路前我们需要左右看。

sentences.en: The crossing is just ahead, so we can cross there safely.
sentences.zh: 十字路口就在前面，所以我们可以安全地在那里过马路。

sentences.en: It's your turn to speak now.
sentences.zh: 现在轮到你说话了。

sentences.en: Take turns to read the story.
sentences.zh: 轮流读这个故事。

sentences.en: The book is on the left side of the desk.
sentences.zh: 书在书桌的左边。

sentences.en: Turn left at the traffic light to get to the park.
sentences.zh: 在红绿灯处向左转就能到达公园。

sentences.en: Go straight down this road to find the park.
sentences.zh: 沿着这条路直走就能找到公园。

sentences.en: She has straight hair that reaches her shoulders.
sentences.zh: 她有一头垂到肩膀的直发。

sentences.en: The answer you chose is right.
sentences.zh: 你选的答案是正确的。

sentences.en: Please make sure your direction is right.
sentences.zh: 请确保你的方向是正确的。

sentences.en: May I ask a question?
sentences.zh: 我可以问一个问题吗？

sentences.en: He likes to ask his teacher for help.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢向他的老师求助。

sentences.en: The sir is wearing a black suit.
sentences.zh: 这位先生穿着黑色西装。

sentences.en: We should respect the sir.
sentences.zh: 我们应该尊敬这位先生。

sentences.en: This story is interesting.
sentences.zh: 这个故事很有趣。

sentences.en: She finds math class interesting.
sentences.zh: 她觉得数学课很有趣。

sentences.en: She is learning Italian at school.
sentences.zh: 她在学校学习意大利语。

sentences.en: Italian food is famous for pizza and pasta.
sentences.zh: 意大利美食以披萨和 pasta 闻名。

sentences.en: We often go to a restaurant for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我们经常去餐馆吃晚餐。

sentences.en: The restaurant serves delicious Italian food.
sentences.zh: 这家餐馆供应美味的意大利菜。

sentences.en: I like to eat pizza for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢晚餐吃披萨。

sentences.en: She ordered a large pizza with pepperoni.
sentences.zh: 她点了一个加意大利辣香肠的大披萨。

sentences.en: I need to get a book from the library.
sentences.zh: 我需要从图书馆拿一本书。

sentences.en: Can you help me get my pen?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我拿一下我的钢笔吗？

sentences.en: BDS is China's independent global satellite navigation system.
sentences.zh: BDS是中国自主建设的全球卫星导航系统。

sentences.en: The full name of BDS is BeiDou Navigation Satellite System.
sentences.zh: BDS的全称是北斗卫星导航系统。

sentences.en: She gave me a book yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天给了我一本书。

sentences.en: My mother gave me a hug when I came home.
sentences.zh: 我回家时妈妈给了我一个拥抱。

sentences.en: This phone has a new feature.
sentences.zh: 这部手机有一个新功能。

sentences.en: The main feature of this park is its large lake.
sentences.zh: 这个公园的主要特色是它的大湖。

sentences.en: Please follow me to the classroom.
sentences.zh: 请跟我到教室。

sentences.en: You should follow the teacher's instructions.
sentences.zh: 你应该听从老师的指示。

sentences.en: The park is far from my home.
sentences.zh: 公园离我家很远。

sentences.en: We can see a far mountain in the distance.
sentences.zh: 我们能看到远处有一座远山。

sentences.en: Please tell me your name.
sentences.zh: 请告诉我你的名字。

sentences.en: Can you tell a story?
sentences.zh: 你能讲个故事吗？

sentences.en: We often go to school on foot.
sentences.zh: 我们经常步行去上学。

sentences.en: She likes to travel around the city on foot.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢步行环游城市。

sentences.en: This book is written by my favorite author.
sentences.zh: 这本书是由我最喜欢的作者写的。

sentences.en: The cake was made by my mother yesterday.
sentences.zh: 这个蛋糕是我妈妈昨天做的。

sentences.en: I take the bus to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天乘公交车去上学。

sentences.en: The bus stops at the station to pick up passengers.
sentences.zh: 公交车在车站停下来接乘客。

sentences.en: The plane flies high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 飞机在高空飞行。

sentences.en: We take a plane to travel to Beijing.
sentences.zh: 我们乘飞机去北京旅行。

sentences.en: I take a taxi to school every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上乘出租车去学校。

sentences.en: The taxi driver helped me carry my luggage.
sentences.zh: 出租车司机帮我搬了行李。

sentences.en: A ship sails on the sea.
sentences.zh: 一艘船在海上航行。

sentences.en: We can travel by ship.
sentences.zh: 我们可以乘船旅行。

sentences.en: I take the subway to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天乘地铁去上学。

sentences.en: The subway is a fast way to travel in the city.
sentences.zh: 地铁是城市里一种快捷的出行方式。

sentences.en: I take the train to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天乘火车去上学。

sentences.en: The train is a fast means of transportation.
sentences.zh: 火车是一种快速的交通工具。

sentences.en: The snail moves slow.
sentences.zh: 蜗牛爬得慢。

sentences.en: Please speak slow so I can understand.
sentences.zh: 请说慢一点，这样我能听懂。

sentences.en: The ball rolls down the hill.
sentences.zh: 球滚下了山。

sentences.en: Please sit down on the chair.
sentences.zh: 请坐在椅子上。

sentences.en: Please slow down when you drive.
sentences.zh: 开车时请减速。

sentences.en: The teacher told us to slow down and read carefully.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们放慢速度，仔细阅读。

sentences.en: Please stop talking in class.
sentences.zh: 请在课堂上停止说话。

sentences.en: The red light means we must stop.
sentences.zh: 红灯意味着我们必须停下。

sentences.en: Mrs Smith is my English teacher.
sentences.zh: 史密斯夫人是我的英语老师。

sentences.en: I should greet Mrs Brown politely.
sentences.zh: 我应该礼貌地问候布朗夫人。

sentences.en: I wake up early every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上起得很早。

sentences.en: Early birds catch the worms.
sentences.zh: 早起的鸟儿有虫吃。

sentences.en: You need to wear a helmet when riding a bike.
sentences.zh: 骑自行车时你需要戴头盔。

sentences.en: The construction worker's helmet is yellow.
sentences.zh: 这位建筑工人的头盔是黄色的。

sentences.en: You must finish your homework on time.
sentences.zh: 你必须按时完成作业。

sentences.en: We must follow the school rules.
sentences.zh: 我们必须遵守校规。

sentences.en: I like to wear a red coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天我喜欢穿一件红色的外套。

sentences.en: She will wear her new dress to the party.
sentences.zh: 她将穿着她的新裙子去参加派对。

sentences.en: Please pay attention to the teacher.
sentences.zh: 请注意听老师讲课。

sentences.en: Attention is important for learning.
sentences.zh: 注意力对学习很重要。

sentences.en: Please pay attention to the teacher in class.
sentences.zh: 请在课堂上注意听老师讲课。

sentences.en: You must pay attention to the traffic lights when crossing the street.
sentences.zh: 过马路时你必须注意交通信号灯。

sentences.en: Traffic lights control the flow of cars and pedestrians on the road.
sentences.zh: 交通信号灯控制道路上汽车和行人的通行。

sentences.en: Red means stop, green means go, and yellow means wait at the traffic lights.
sentences.zh: 交通信号灯红灯表示停止，绿灯表示通行，黄灯表示等待。

sentences.en: Munich is a major city in Germany.
sentences.zh: 慕尼黑是德国的一个主要城市。

sentences.en: Many people visit Munich for its famous Oktoberfest.
sentences.zh: 许多人因著名的啤酒节而访问慕尼黑。

sentences.en: Germany is a country in Europe.
sentences.zh: 德国是欧洲的一个国家。

sentences.en: The capital of Germany is Berlin.
sentences.zh: 德国的首都是柏林。

sentences.en: Alaska is the largest state in the United States.
sentences.zh: 阿拉斯加是美国面积最大的州。

sentences.en: Many people visit Alaska to see the Northern Lights.
sentences.zh: 许多人去阿拉斯加看北极光。

sentences.en: We pull the sled through the snow.
sentences.zh: 我们拉着雪橇穿过雪地。

sentences.en: The sled carries gifts for Christmas.
sentences.zh: 雪橇载着圣诞节的礼物。

sentences.en: A cheetah is a fast animal.
sentences.zh: 猎豹是一种跑得快的动物。

sentences.en: He runs fast to catch the bus.
sentences.zh: 他快速跑去赶公交车。

sentences.en: We take the ferry to cross the river.
sentences.zh: 我们乘渡轮过河。

sentences.en: The ferry arrives at the harbor every hour.
sentences.zh: 渡轮每小时到达港口一次。

sentences.en: Papa Westray is a small island in Scotland.
sentences.zh: 帕帕韦斯特雷岛是苏格兰的一个小岛。

sentences.en: People can travel to Papa Westray by plane or boat.
sentences.zh: 人们可以乘飞机或船前往帕帕韦斯特雷岛。

sentences.en: Scotland is a country in the United Kingdom.
sentences.zh: 苏格兰是英国的一个国家。

sentences.en: The capital city of Scotland is Edinburgh.
sentences.zh: 苏格兰的首都是爱丁堡。

sentences.en: I want to visit my grandparents this weekend.
sentences.zh: 这个周末我想去看望我的祖父母。

sentences.en: We plan to visit the museum next Monday.
sentences.zh: 我们计划下周一参观博物馆。

sentences.en: I like watching a film on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在周末看电影。

sentences.en: This film tells an interesting story.
sentences.zh: 这部电影讲述了一个有趣的故事。

sentences.en: I want to see a film with my friends this weekend.
sentences.zh: 这个周末我想和朋友们一起看电影。

sentences.en: She often goes to see a film on Saturday evenings.
sentences.zh: 她经常在周六晚上去看电影。

sentences.en: I want to take a trip to the mountains.
sentences.zh: 我想去山里旅行。

sentences.en: We planned a trip to the beach next summer.
sentences.zh: 我们计划明年夏天去海滩旅行。

sentences.en: I want to take a trip to the mountains this summer.
sentences.zh: 今年夏天我想去山里旅行。

sentences.en: My family and I often take a trip during the holidays.
sentences.zh: 我和我的家人经常在假期去旅行。

sentences.en: I often buy fruits and vegetables in the supermarket.
sentences.zh: 我经常在超市买水果和蔬菜。

sentences.en: The supermarket is crowded with customers on weekends.
sentences.zh: 周末超市里挤满了顾客。

sentences.en: We often have dinner in the evening.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在晚上吃晚饭。

sentences.en: The sun sets in the evening.
sentences.zh: 太阳在晚上落下。

sentences.en: I will finish my homework tonight.
sentences.zh: 我今晚将完成我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: We are going to watch a movie tonight.
sentences.zh: 我们今晚要去看电影。

sentences.en: I will go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天要去公园。

sentences.en: Tomorrow is Wednesday.
sentences.zh: 明天是星期三。

sentences.en: We will have a test next week.
sentences.zh: 我们下周将有一场考试。

sentences.en: She plans to visit her grandparents next week.
sentences.zh: 她计划下周去看望她的祖父母。

sentences.en: A dictionary helps us find the meaning of new words.
sentences.zh: 字典帮助我们查找新单词的意思。

sentences.en: I use a dictionary when I don't know a word.
sentences.zh: 当我不认识一个单词时，我会用字典。

sentences.en: I like reading comic books.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢看漫画书。

sentences.en: This comic is very interesting.
sentences.zh: 这本漫画很有趣。

syllables:
word

**说明**：根据Collins词典，"word" 的音标为 /wɜːd/，属于单音节词，因此无需分割。

sentences.en: I need to learn a new word today.
sentences.zh: 我今天需要学一个新单词。

sentences.en: Can you spell this word for me?
sentences.zh: 你能为我拼写这个单词吗？

sentences.en: I use a word book to learn new words.
sentences.zh: 我用单词本学习新单词。

sentences.en: My word book has many English words.
sentences.zh: 我的单词本里有很多英语单词。

sentences.en: I sent a postcard to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我给我的朋友寄了一张明信片。

sentences.en: She bought a beautiful postcard as a souvenir.
sentences.zh: 她买了一张漂亮的明信片作为纪念品。

sentences.en: We have an English lesson today.
sentences.zh: 我们今天有一节英语课。

sentences.en: I like my math lesson very much.
sentences.zh: 我非常喜欢我的数学课。

sentences.en: The sun and stars are in space.
sentences.zh: 太阳和星星都在太空中。

sentences.en: Astronauts travel to space in rockets.
sentences.zh: 宇航员乘坐火箭前往太空。

sentences.en: I love to travel to different countries.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢去不同的国家旅行。

sentences.en: Travel can help us learn about new cultures.
sentences.zh: 旅行可以帮助我们了解新的文化。

sentences.en: Half of the cake is for you.
sentences.zh: 这块蛋糕的一半是给你的。

sentences.en: I need half an hour to finish homework.
sentences.zh: 我需要半小时完成作业。

sentences.en: The price of the book is ten dollars.
sentences.zh: 这本书的价格是十美元。

sentences.en: Can you tell me the price of this shirt?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我这件衬衫的价格吗？

sentences.en: The Mid-Autumn Festival is a traditional Chinese holiday.
sentences.zh: 中秋节是中国的传统节日。

sentences.en: People eat mooncakes during the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.zh: 人们在中秋节吃月饼。

sentences.en: We study together every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天一起学习。

sentences.en: They like to play games together.
sentences.zh: 他们喜欢一起玩游戏。

sentences.en: We plan to get together for dinner this weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们计划这个周末聚在一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: My friends and I often get together to play games.
sentences.zh: 我和朋友们经常聚在一起玩游戏。

sentences.en: We eat mooncakes during the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.zh: 我们在中秋节吃月饼。

sentences.en: A mooncake is a traditional Chinese pastry.
sentences.zh: 月饼是一种传统的中式糕点。

sentences.en: A poem is a piece of writing that expresses emotions through rhythm and words.
sentences.zh: 诗歌是一种通过节奏和文字表达情感的文学作品。

sentences.en: We read a beautiful poem in our English class today.
sentences.zh: 今天我们在英语课上读了一首优美的诗歌。

sentences.en: The moon is bright at night.
sentences.zh: 月亮在晚上很明亮。

sentences.en: We can see the moon in the sky.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在天空中看到月亮。

sentences.en: We do many studies in science class.
sentences.zh: 我们在科学课上做很多研究。

sentences.en: She reads studies to learn new things.
sentences.zh: 她阅读研究来学习新东西。

sentences.en: I like to solve a puzzle.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢解决一个谜题。

sentences.en: This puzzle is very interesting.
sentences.zh: 这个谜题非常有趣。

sentences.en: I enjoy hiking in the mountains on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢周末在山里徒步旅行。

sentences.en: Hiking is a great way to exercise and enjoy nature.
sentences.zh: 徒步旅行是锻炼身体和享受自然的好方式。

sentences.en: I want to find a pen pal to practice English.
sentences.zh: 我想找一个笔友来练习英语。

sentences.en: My pen pal lives in America and we write letters often.
sentences.zh: 我的笔友住在美国，我们经常写信。

sentences.en: My hobby is reading books.
sentences.zh: 我的爱好是读书。

sentences.en: She likes to talk about her hobby.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢谈论她的爱好。

sentences.en: Jasmine is a kind of fragrant flower.
sentences.zh: 茉莉花是一种芳香的花。

sentences.en: I like the smell of jasmine.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢茉莉花的香味。

sentences.en: I have a good idea.
sentences.zh: 我有一个好主意。

sentences.en: Her idea is very creative.
sentences.zh: 她的想法很有创意。

sentences.en: Canberra is the capital city of Australia.
sentences.zh: 堪培拉是澳大利亚的首都。

sentences.en: I learned that Canberra is located in the southeastern part of Australia.
sentences.zh: 我了解到堪培拉位于澳大利亚的东南部。

sentences.en: The view from the mountain is amazing.
sentences.zh: 山顶的景色令人惊叹。

sentences.en: She did an amazing job on her project.
sentences.zh: 她的项目完成得非常出色。

sentences.en: We shall go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天要去公园。

sentences.en: You shall finish your homework first.
sentences.zh: 你应该先完成你的作业。

sentences.en: My goal is to learn English well.
sentences.zh: 我的目标是学好英语。

sentences.en: Setting a clear goal helps us work hard.
sentences.zh: 设定明确的目标帮助我们努力。

sentences.en: I want to join the English club.
sentences.zh: 我想加入英语俱乐部。

sentences.en: Can you join us for dinner tonight?
sentences.zh: 你今晚能和我们一起吃晚饭吗？

sentences.en: We often meet at the club after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我们经常在俱乐部见面。

sentences.en: He is a member of the music club.
sentences.zh: 他是音乐俱乐部的成员。

sentences.en: Can you share your toys with me?
sentences.zh: 你能和我分享你的玩具吗？

sentences.en: We should share our happiness with friends.
sentences.zh: 我们应该和朋友分享快乐。

sentences.en: The factory produces many cars every day.
sentences.zh: 这家工厂每天生产很多汽车。

sentences.en: Workers go to the factory early in the morning.
sentences.zh: 工人们早上很早就去工厂。

sentences.en: The worker is building a house.
sentences.zh: 这位工人正在建造房子。

sentences.en: My father is a hardworking worker.
sentences.zh: 我的爸爸是一名勤劳的工人。

sentences.en: The postman delivers letters every morning.
sentences.zh: 邮递员每天早上送信。

sentences.en: My father used to be a postman.
sentences.zh: 我的爸爸曾经是一名邮递员。

sentences.en: The businessman travels to many cities to meet clients.
sentences.zh: 这位商人前往许多城市会见客户。

sentences.en: My uncle is a successful businessman who owns a big company.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔是一位成功的商人，他拥有一家大公司。

sentences.en: A police officer helps keep people safe.
sentences.zh: 警察帮助保护人们的安全。

sentences.en: The police officer wears a uniform.
sentences.zh: 这位警察穿着制服。

sentences.en: The fisherman catches fish in the river every morning.
sentences.zh: 这位渔民每天早上在河里捕鱼。

sentences.en: My grandfather was a skilled fisherman when he was young.
sentences.zh: 我爷爷年轻时是一位技艺娴熟的渔民。

sentences.en: A scientist conducts experiments to discover new things.
sentences.zh: 科学家通过做实验来发现新事物。

sentences.en: My dream is to become a great scientist in the future.
sentences.zh: 我的梦想是将来成为一名伟大的科学家。

sentences.en: The pilot flies the airplane carefully.
sentences.zh: 飞行员小心地驾驶飞机。

sentences.en: My uncle is a skilled pilot.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔是一名熟练的飞行员。

sentences.en: My coach teaches me how to play basketball.
sentences.zh: 我的教练教我如何打篮球。

sentences.en: The coach gives us advice before the game.
sentences.zh: 教练在比赛前给我们提建议。

sentences.en: China is a great country.
sentences.zh: 中国是一个伟大的国家。

sentences.en: He wants to visit another country.
sentences.zh: 他想参观另一个国家。

sentences.en: Our head teacher is very kind to us.
sentences.zh: 我们的班主任对我们非常好。

sentences.en: I need to talk to the head teacher after class.
sentences.zh: 我下课后需要和班主任谈话。

sentences.en: The sea is blue and vast.
sentences.zh: 大海又蓝又广阔。

sentences.en: We can swim in the sea in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我们可以在海里游泳。

sentences.en: I want to stay at home today.
sentences.zh: 我今天想待在家里。

sentences.en: You can stay here for a while.
sentences.zh: 你可以在这里待一会儿。

sentences.en: I study at a university.
sentences.zh: 我在一所大学学习。

sentences.en: She wants to go to university next year.
sentences.zh: 她明年想去上大学。

sentences.en: I go to the gym every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上去健身房。

sentences.en: We can exercise at the gym.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在健身房锻炼。

sentences.en: If it rains, we will stay at home.
sentences.zh: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.en: You can go out if you finish your homework.
sentences.zh: 如果你完成作业，就可以出去。

sentences.en: The reporter is interviewing a famous actor.
sentences.zh: 这位记者正在采访一位著名演员。

sentences.en: She wants to be a good reporter when she grows up.
sentences.zh: 她长大后想成为一名优秀的记者。

sentences.en: I use a pen to write.
sentences.zh: 我用钢笔写字。

sentences.en: We can use this book to learn.
sentences.zh: 我们可以用这本书学习。

sentences.en: What type of book do you like?
sentences.zh: 你喜欢什么类型的书？

sentences.en: This is a new type of computer.
sentences.zh: 这是一种新型电脑。

sentences.en: Please quickly finish your homework.
sentences.zh: 请快点完成你的作业。

sentences.en: He runs quickly to catch the bus.
sentences.zh: 他快速跑去赶公交车。

sentences.en: The secretary is typing a letter.
sentences.zh: 秘书正在打一封信。

sentences.en: My dad's secretary helps him with work.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸的秘书帮他处理工作。

sentences.en: She was angry because he forgot her birthday.
sentences.zh: 她很生气，因为他忘记了她的生日。

sentences.en: The angry dog barked loudly at the stranger.
sentences.zh: 那只生气的狗对着陌生人大声吠叫。

sentences.en: She is afraid of the dark.
sentences.zh: 她害怕黑暗。

sentences.en: Don't be afraid to ask questions.
sentences.zh: 不要害怕提问。

sentences.en: She felt sad when her friend moved away.
sentences.zh: 当她的朋友搬走时，她感到难过。

sentences.en: The sad movie made many people cry.
sentences.zh: 这部悲伤的电影让很多人哭了。

sentences.en: She looks worried about her test results.
sentences.zh: 她看起来很担心她的考试成绩。

sentences.en: Don't be worried; everything will be okay.
sentences.zh: 别担心，一切都会好起来的。

sentences.en: She looks happy today.
sentences.zh: 她今天看起来很高兴。

sentences.en: Playing games makes me happy.
sentences.zh: 玩游戏让我很开心。

sentences.en: If you feel sick, you should see a doctor.
sentences.zh: 如果你感觉不舒服，你应该去看医生。

sentences.en: My mom tells me to see a doctor when I have a fever.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈告诉我发烧时要去看医生。

sentences.en: I wear a red coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天我穿一件红色的外套。

sentences.en: She likes to wear sunglasses on sunny days.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在晴天戴太阳镜。

sentences.en: I need more time to finish my homework.
sentences.zh: 我需要更多时间来完成作业。

sentences.en: There are more books on the shelf than before.
sentences.zh: 书架上的书比以前更多了。

sentences.en: The well is very deep.
sentences.zh: 这口井很深。

sentences.en: He took a deep breath.
sentences.zh: 他深深地吸了一口气。

sentences.en: I need to take a deep breath when I am nervous.
sentences.zh: 当我紧张的时候，我需要深呼吸。

sentences.en: Fish breathe through their gills underwater.
sentences.zh: 鱼在水下通过鳃呼吸。

sentences.en: When you feel nervous, take a deep breath to calm down.
sentences.zh: 当你感到紧张时，深呼吸来冷静下来。

sentences.en: The teacher told us to take a deep breath before starting the exam.
sentences.zh: 老师告诉我们在开始考试前深呼吸。

sentences.en: Can you count the number of apples?
sentences.zh: 你能数一下苹果的数量吗？

sentences.en: We need to count from one to ten.
sentences.zh: 我们需要从一数到十。

sentences.en: Let's count to ten together: one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.
sentences.zh: 让我们一起数到十：一、二、三、四、五、六、七、八、九、十。

sentences.en: When you count to ten, you start at one and end at ten.
sentences.zh: 当你数到十时，你从一开始，到十结束。

sentences.en: Mice like to eat cheese.
sentences.zh: 老鼠喜欢吃奶酪。

sentences.en: The cat chased the mice in the house.
sentences.zh: 猫在房子里追赶老鼠。

sentences.en: This movie is bad.
sentences.zh: 这部电影很差劲。

sentences.en: Eating too much candy is bad for teeth.
sentences.zh: 吃太多糖果对牙齿不好。

sentences.en: He fell off the bike and hurt his knee.
sentences.zh: 他从自行车上摔下来，伤到了膝盖。

sentences.en: Please be careful not to hurt yourself with the knife.
sentences.zh: 请小心，不要被刀伤到自己。

sentences.en: She is ill today.
sentences.zh: 她今天生病了。

sentences.en: He stayed at home because he was ill.
sentences.zh: 他因为生病了所以待在家里。

sentences.en: The answer is wrong.
sentences.zh: 这个答案是错误的。

sentences.en: It's wrong to lie.
sentences.zh: 撒谎是不对的。

sentences.en: You should study hard every day.
sentences.zh: 你应该每天努力学习。

sentences.en: We should help each other when in need.
sentences.zh: 我们在需要时应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: How do you feel today?
sentences.zh: 你今天感觉怎么样？

sentences.en: I feel happy when I play with friends.
sentences.zh: 和朋友一起玩的时候我感到开心。

sentences.en: Well done! You finished the homework.
sentences.zh: 做得好！你完成了作业。

sentences.en: Well, let's start our English class now.
sentences.zh: 好啦，我们现在开始英语课吧。

sentences.en: Please sit down on the chair.
sentences.zh: 请坐在椅子上。

sentences.en: She likes to sit by the window.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢坐在窗边。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard is green.
sentences.zh: 院子里的草是绿色的。

sentences.en: Cows like to eat fresh grass.
sentences.zh: 奶牛喜欢吃新鲜的草。

sentences.en: I can hear birds singing outside.
sentences.zh: 我能听到外面小鸟在唱歌。

sentences.en: Did you hear the teacher's question?
sentences.zh: 你听到老师的问题了吗？

sentences.en: An ant is a small insect that lives in a colony.
sentences.zh: 蚂蚁是一种生活在群体中的小昆虫。

sentences.en: The ant carries a piece of food back to its nest.
sentences.zh: 这只蚂蚁把一块食物搬回了它的巢穴。

sentences.en: Don't worry, everything will be okay.
sentences.zh: 别担心，一切都会好起来的。

sentences.en: She has a lot of worry about her exams.
sentences.zh: 她很担心她的考试。

sentences.en: I got stuck in the mud and couldn't move.
sentences.zh: 我陷在泥里动弹不得。

sentences.en: She was stuck on the difficult math problem for hours.
sentences.zh: 她被这道数学难题困住了好几个小时。

sentences.en: The children like to play in the mud.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在泥里玩。

sentences.en: Her shoes were covered with mud after the rain.
sentences.zh: 雨后她的鞋子沾满了泥。

sentences.en: Can you help me pull the door open?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我把门拉开吗？

sentences.en: She likes to pull her little sister's hair gently.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢轻轻地拉她小妹妹的头发。

sentences.en: Everyone is here today.
sentences.zh: 今天所有人都在这里。

sentences.en: Everyone likes playing games.
sentences.zh: 每个人都喜欢玩游戏。
